item.title: [JBCHEPHARM] Torrent Pharmaceuticals Acquires 7.44 Million Shares of JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals
item.description:
Torrent Pharmaceuticals Limited has acquired 7,44,81,519 equity shares of JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Limited from Tau Investment Holdings Pte. Ltd. This acquisition was made pursuant to a share purchase agreement dated June 29, 2025, and it includes 1,317 equity shares acquired on December 5, 2025, as part of an open offer. The total equity shares of JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Limited now held by Torrent Pharmaceuticals Limited amount to 47.55% of the total voting capital.

item.title: [JBCHEPHARM] Tau Investment Holdings Sells Entire Stake in JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals to Torrent Pharmaceuticals
item.description:
Tau Investment Holdings Pte Ltd has sold its entire stake in JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals Ltd to Torrent Pharmaceuticals Limited. The sale, which took place on 21st January 2026, was carried out in accordance with a Share Purchase Agreement (SPA) dated 29th June 2025. Post-transaction, Tau Investment Holdings has been reclassified from the 'promoter' category to the 'public' category. The transaction marks Torrent Pharmaceuticals' acquisition of control over JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals.

  • Tau Investment Holdings sells entire stake in JB Chemicals & Pharmaceuticals to Torrent Pharmaceuticals
  • Sale carried out in accordance with a Share Purchase Agreement (SPA) dated 29th June 2025
  • Tau Investment Holdings reclassified from 'promoter' category to 'public' category post-transaction

item.title: [SWOEF] Rajesh Nanubhai Jhaveri Acquires 6.05% Stake in Swojas Foods Ltd Through Warrant Conversion
item.description:

item.title: [GLITTEKG] Acquirers Submit Draft Letter of Offer to Public Shareholders of Glittek Granites Ltd
item.description:
Vivro Financial Services Pvt. Ltd, on behalf of the acquirers, has submitted a draft letter of offer to the public shareholders of Glittek Granites Ltd. The acquirers, Maheshkumar Jatashankar Thanki, Bhargav Girjashankar Thanki, Bhavin Harihar Thanki, Kalpana Ashwinkumar Thanki, Hema Bhargay Thanki, and Gautam Aahwinkumar Thanki, along with Rawmin Mining And Industries Private Limited, aim to acquire up to 67,50,000 fully paid-up equity shares of the company, representing 26% of the equity share capital. The offer price is set at Rs. 12.65 per equity share, payable in cash. The offer is not conditional upon any minimum level of acceptance and is not a competing offer. The offer opens on Wednesday, March 4, 2026, and closes on Tuesday, March 17, 2026.

  • Acquirers submit draft letter of offer to public shareholders of Glittek Granites Ltd
  • Offer to acquire up to 67,50,000 equity shares representing 26% of the company's equity share capital
  • Offer price set at Rs. 12.65 per equity share, payable in cash
  • Not conditional upon any minimum level of acceptance
  • Offer opens on Wednesday, March 4, 2026, and closes on Tuesday, March 17, 2026
